```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
doubled <- read_csv("../Data/intracoding.csv")


doubled$class_old <- ifelse(doubled$anti==1,2,0)
doubled$class_old <- ifelse(doubled$pro==1,1,doubled$class_old)

doubled$class_new <- ifelse(doubled$New_Anti==1,2,0)
doubled$class_new <- ifelse(doubled$New_Pro==1,1,doubled$class_new)



```

```{r}
mean(doubled$class_old == doubled$class_new, na.rm = TRUE)
```
